name: Armed Blue Gunvolt Striker Pack
overview: The Azure Striker Gunvolt Striker Pack contains both Azure Striker Gunvol tand Azure Striker Gunvolt 2, two of our flagship games that originally made their home on the Nintendo 3DS. With the release of the Switch version of the Striker Pack, there are a host of new features, improvements, and bonus content that make it the truly complete version of the Azure Striker Gunvolt experience
